attributes.action: yorkshire independence but also keep the queen as head.
attributes.additional_details: Since the government in london as buggered yorkshire up right in the last 30 years i think it about yorkshire had her independence from those fools in london, Make yorkshire great again if i was prime minister make sure no one is poor in yorkshire jobs every one steel industry up and running mines up and running textiles up and running, a tax haven , basicly an economy what most of the UK and europe will want and not spending money we don't have and any member of yorkshire parliament  caught on the fiddle put in prison to do hard labour and hanging back national service and pound shilling pence back.
